name: Classic Road
overview: Classic Road is the first game in the Classic Road game series for the Playstation console and is a horse breeding game. In the game the player can compete in different races around Japan. The game features different horse breeds, racing stadiums, and the goal of the game is to have a horse champion. The player can't control the horse during the races, so it will depends of the horse training if he will win or not the races, the engine in the races is in 3d.
